metadata.name: Use of Remote.exe
metadata.comment: Remote.exe is part of WinDbg in the Windows SDK and can be used for AWL bypass and running remote files.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\remote.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('remote.exe'))

output.summary: Remote.exe is part of WinDbg in the Windows SDK and can be used for AWL bypass and running remote files.

metadata.objective: False positive: Approved installs of Windows SDK with Debugging Tools for Windows (WinDbg). References: https://blog.thecybersecuritytutor.com/Exeuction-AWL-Bypass-Remote-exe-LOLBin/, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/OtherMSBinaries/Remote/
